BAD_OR_EXPIRED_OTP:
To register your code successfully and minimize failed attempts, remember it is a unique data with limited validity. Follow these steps for a smooth process:

  1. Getting the code:
    • Authenticate via your chosen service (email or phone) to receive the code.
  2. Using the code:
    • Enter the code exactly and quickly to prevent it from expiring.
    • Double-check the code before proceeding.
  3. If the code expires:
    • Select “Resend code” to get a new one.

Additional Tips

  • Keep it private: Don’t share your access data with anyone.
  • Need help? Contact our support team if you have any questions or issues.

Follow these steps to register your code efficiently and securely.
